sentences: With the sun shining on a beautiful Saturday in Buenos Aires, many delegates found themselves intrigued in side-events and beleaguered in contact groups at La Rural.
Many delegates lamented progress on SBI issues, possibly worse than in previous years.
As some delegates noted, the intention to block progress on the issues by a small group of countries may be directly related to the fact that the Kyoto Protocol will soon enter into force.

On the other hand, progress was made on some SBSTA issues, with delegates applauding the success of reaching agreement on the rules for small-scale afforestation and reforestation activities under the CDM.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
